outputs.output_descr: Contribution to the social and economic stabilization of Northern Uganda with special focus on youth employment and local economic recovery, community security, justice and reconciliation, and local governance and civic education.
Local government capacity strengthened and social cohesion enhanced; and development interventions implemented targeting youth and women's empowerment, and livelihoods and economic development.

project_descr: This Project will aim at strengthening local government capacity to enhance social cohesion through citizen security and justice initiatives; and development interventions targeting youth and women's empowerment, and livelihoods and economic development.
project_title: Local Development and Social Cohesion in Northern Uganda
